exceptions.exn: In environment T : CompleteSpace T', P : T -> Prop Q : forall x : T, T' x <-> P x H : posreal Unable to unify "forall eps : posreal, ball (iota P) eps ?M2436" with "(let (ball, _, _, _) := UniformSpace.class T in ball) (iota T') H (iota P)".

original: intros T P Q H. unfold close. intros x eps. apply (iota_correct_weak P). intros x y HPx HPy. apply (H x). split. - intros Hx. apply HPy. apply Hx. apply HPx. - intros Hx. apply HPx. apply Hx. apply HPy. auto.
